attributes.action: Fight for change of the Welton Junction on th A46 lincolnshire
attributes.additional_details: Please Sign this petition and fight for change of the Welton junction on the A46. Scott Ashley Bennett aged 24 died on 03 Nov 2012 at 8.50 in a tragic accident at the Welton junction on the A46 on his way to special police trainng, Scott had such a great life in front of him. The day before Scott died another young man was killed a the Same junction , the day after Scott a lady was injured at the Same junction. The road is known as a red route and changes needs to be made to make the road safer. Welton junction alone has taken to many lifes , PLEASE HELP by signing , confirming and sharing this petition wth all you know. We know it will never bring the lovd ones back that have been sadley lost by many over the years but it could prevent anymore in the future. PLEASE SIGN , CONFIRM & SHARE

rejection.details: The A46 at that point on its route is a local authority road - it would be for that authority to take this forward.
